NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING
PROGRAM OFFERING
Titles WINDOW ON THE WORLD IV
Type: Talk
Times 15sOO
Noâ€¢s Continuous
Origins British Information Service
Audience s General
Serial Numbers 56-54
Release Dates January 6, 1957
Once again we are pleased to offer WINDOW ON THE WORLD, a series of interesting
and informative short talks by prominent British citizens.
As with most of our talk programs, definite speakers and topics have not been,
lined up as yet. However, when the titles and speakers are known to us, we will
inform all stations.
